answers.answer: Feeling very excited!! :) 27+3 due 4th november with another boy and 88 days left :) apart from the odd pain i actually feel fab which is a nice change compared to my other two pregnancies. Not really got heartburn or any stretchmarks yet and havent had morning sickness from 11 weeks. I was sick for 6 months solid with my first and sick up to week 22 with second. Decided with second pregnancy defo isnt for me but if my first was as easy as this id probably be popping them out like kittens lol hope labour is as easy! :) how are you?

36+2 and loving it though tired of being sick and hurting. Due Sept. 3 the doc wants me yo have her before or right on time. I have gestational diabetes and am a high risk due to it. I want to hold my little girl and cant wait just like her daddy. My doc says she is perfect weight even though I gave diabetes and morning sickness seems to be the norm, started at six weeks and is still happening. I'm excited and cant wait already nesting lol.

Im 26 weeks tomorrow, 99 days left with a girl! Second baby so ill have one of each :) feeling so tired all the time but that might be due to the fact im running around after a 3 year old monster haha cant wait for my baby girls arrival ! Has everyone picked a name?
I'm 24w 3d 109 days to go due november 25th. With a boy thomas anthony. Been feeling great! Heart burn and charlie horses are my only complaints.
25w3days 102 days to go...woohooo almost down to double digits! I'm due Nov 18 with a little girl! :) I've been feeling tired and super hormonal!

Im considering Lana jayne as a name for my little one :) not fully deciding until shes herw though o.h is already calling her it haha acnes awful ismt it I had it all over my back with my first and can see it starting to return again now I never have a clear face either joys of pregnancy!
I am 27weeks and 5days. With 86 days to go. I am due on the 2 with a baby boy. I have been having back pain and my feet are swelling up. I go in for my glucose test tomorrow as well.

im 26w3d with my second little girl.(:im having horrible back && hip pains && heartburn is killing me && im so tired all thee time.asidee from that im goood.(:just waiting on her too make her appereance.(:

Im 25+6 just hit double digits today yay 99 days left. I can't wait this is my third baby second boy and November 15th can't come fast enough. Im anxious to meet my little man. The back aches are getting much worse so sleep is little to none lately. My feet have been swelling up and I know tmi but I can't even get some without bleeding after. Come on November! Lol
Lol yes! Come one NOV. we are so far away but yet so close lol!
I'm due Nov 17 and have 101 days left! My morning sickness is still around and I have chronic kidney stones but other than that I'm super excited for baby boy to get here!

I'm 23w & 5d due November 30 w/ a healthy baby not sure what it is. I'm having pains I'm guessing they're BH,hungry and sleepy all the time and EXTRA sensitive about everything... just ready for November to get here so I can meet my little snickerdoodle :)
@AmandaJane88 that's my daughters birthday. She is my first born now my son is due two days before her birthday :)
Val_mommy2b do you wanna find out what your having? Or you want it to be a surprise?

question: How are y'all feeling? How many days lefts? How many weeks are you? When are you due? And what you having? I'm so excited I'm almost 6 n ahalf months I'm 25 weeks 1 day. I got 104 days to go with my lil boy of mine. I'm feeling great but hate that I have a 3 hour glucose test tomorrow because I was 1 point over on my first test. So it's 9 pm and I'm drinking water from here on out lol.
title: November mommies
